long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Integrate RblxTrade data into Roblox with the official RblxTrade extension.

Values are automatically added to trades in your trade list, the create trade window, catalog pages, and profiles. In addition, projected and rare tags are added to items which warrant them. Each feature can be toggled on or off in the popup window.

- Trading values can help you determine if a trade is good or not. Our red and green coloring on inbound trades can help you instantly tell if you should accept or decline a trade, without having to use a value site or rely on RAP.
- User profile values can help you tell if the user you're viewing might have any items you want. In addition, you can click on their value for easy access to their inventory on RblxTrade.
- Projected tags can help warn you if an items recent average price (RAP) is artificially inflated.
